channel.title: Hamachi
channel.description: I don't understand how to use hamachi, do i just log on go to the network provided then go on to the moparscape server and type in the ip?? If so thats not working for me and i can't get on.

item.title: Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @F0rum_Mvp F0rum Mvp
item.description:
@F0rum_Mvp wrote:

zak 45:

I don’t understand how to use hamachi, do i just log on go to the network provided then go on to the moparscape server and type in the ip?? If so thats not working for me and i can’t get on.

Here is a simple run through on how it works.

ok, if you look on server advertisement, some servers will need you to have hamachi for you to join the server. look on that thread at the hamachi username (e.g Server 1-10). Now look in the bottom right corner of your hamachi box and look for a triangle with 3 dots symbol, not the the circle one. Click on join existing network and type in the server username and pass. On a thread it could say ( user: Server 1-10 Pass: 123). Make sure you use capital letters and spaces as it is shown. Now look for the owner of the server’s ip and check if the server is online. check you have the right port and you should be able to log on a ham server.

Sorry if this is a bit long and confusing.

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @t3h_0wn4g3 t3h 0wn4g3
item.description:
@t3h_0wn4g3 wrote:

jules1313:

when uve logged in to the server , u look for the owner (most times has a name like : SERVERNAME owner). Then click right mouse and copy. then in moarscape client go to file , new ip and do ctrl+V

that makes no sense.

anyway, you type the ip in the hamachi part ( when downloaded ham )
i think it says “new server”
dunno, havent had ham for a long time
